item.title: Wish I could afford it!
item.description:
Wish I could afford it!

All five downloadable content pack: The Hidden Secrets Pack The Battle Hardened Pack Tyranny of King Washington: The Infamy Tyranny of King Washington: The Betrayal Tyranny of King Washington: The Redemption 4 bonus single-player missions, adding over an hour of additional gameplay The official Assassin's CreedÂ® III soundtrack (mp3 files) George Washington's notebook (pdf file) The American Colonies, 1775.
